text: Korapa tagehonteti eno meni tagritema egeta tusi'a kumi hu'none. E'ina hu'negu Kagra ha' vahetia zamatranke'za e'za tagri'ene kini vahetine pristi vahetinena ha' eme hurante'za tagatere'naze. Ana nehu'za mago'a vahera eme zamahe nefri'za mago'a vahera eme tavre'za kina ome hurante'naze. Ana nehu'za feno zantia eneri'za tatarazageta tagazegu nehuta mani'none.
